entry.title: Opening Preferences in most Mac Apps
entry.summary: Hey guys! I recently learned that if you press ⌘ + , it will open the preferences window for most Mac Apps. Very helpful! / Linus...
entry.content:
Hey guys!

I recently learned that if you press ⌘ + , it will open the preferences window for most Mac Apps.

Very helpful!

/ Linus

entry.title: My First Blog Post
entry.summary: Hey guys, so this is my first blog post. On this website I will write up articles about things that interest me. Thanks for stopping by! / Linus...
entry.content:
Hey guys, so this is my first blog post.

On this website I will write up articles about things that interest me.

Thanks for stopping by!

/ Linus
